metadata.title: RZ/V: Is it possible to change Data Type with DRP-AI Translator.

sections.content:
Question:
Is it possible to change Data Type with DRP-AI Translator.
Answer:
DRP-AI Translator change automatically the data type into their own proper one.
In RZ/V2L, V2M, V2MA, data type will be changed into FP16 after translation.  In next generation of RZ/V familly, it will be INT8.
Suitable Products
RZ/V
